description: Associates one or more targets with an event window. Only one type of target (instance IDs, Dedicated Host IDs, or tags) can be specified with an event window. For more information, see Define event windows for scheduled events in the Amazon EC2 User Guide.

parameters.name: InstanceEventWindowId
parameters.description: The ID of the event window.

parameters.name: AssociationTarget
parameters.description: One or more targets associated with the specified event window. InstanceIds (list) --- The IDs of the instances to associate with the event window. If the instance is on a Dedicated Host, you can't specify the Instance ID parameter; you must use the Dedicated Host ID parameter. (string) --- InstanceTags (list) --- The instance tags to associate with the event window. Any instances associated with the tags will be associated with the event window. Note that while you can't create tag keys beginning with aws:, you can specify existing Amazon Web Services managed tag keys (with the aws: prefix) when specifying them as targets to associate with the event window. (dict) --- Describes a tag. Key (string) --- The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 127 Unicode characters. May not begin with aws:. Value (string) --- The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 256 Unicode characters. DedicatedHostIds (list) --- The IDs of the Dedicated Hosts to associate with the event window. (string) ---

nested_params.name: InstanceIds
nested_params.description: The IDs of the instances to associate with the event window. If the instance is on a Dedicated Host, you can't specify the Instance ID parameter; you must use the Dedicated Host ID parameter.

nested_params.name: InstanceTags
nested_params.description: The instance tags to associate with the event window. Any instances associated with the tags will be associated with the event window. Note that while you can't create tag keys beginning with aws:, you can specify existing Amazon Web Services managed tag keys (with the aws: prefix) when specifying them as targets to associate with the event window.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 127 Unicode characters. May not begin with aws:.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 256 Unicode characters.

nested_params.name: DedicatedHostIds
nested_params.description: The IDs of the Dedicated Hosts to associate with the event window.

nested_items.name: InstanceEventWindow
nested_items.description: Information about the event window.

nested_items.name: InstanceEventWindowId
nested_items.description: The ID of the event window.

nested_items.name: TimeRanges
nested_items.description: One or more time ranges defined for the event window.

nested_items.name: StartWeekDay
nested_items.description: The day on which the time range begins.

nested_items.name: StartHour
nested_items.description: The hour when the time range begins.

nested_items.name: EndWeekDay
nested_items.description: The day on which the time range ends.

nested_items.name: EndHour
nested_items.description: The hour when the time range ends.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the event window.

nested_items.name: CronExpression
nested_items.description: The cron expression defined for the event window.

nested_items.name: AssociationTarget
nested_items.description: One or more targets associated with the event window.

nested_items.name: InstanceIds
nested_items.description: The IDs of the instances associated with the event window.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The instance tags associated with the event window. Any instances associated with the tags will be associated with the event window.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: DedicatedHostIds
nested_items.description: The IDs of the Dedicated Hosts associated with the event window.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the event window.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The instance tags associated with the event window.
